name: download_stream
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ytstream_download_youtube_videos.
Tool description: Download or stream YouTube Videos/MP4.
API description: Downloads or streams video information from YouTube using the provided RapidAPI key.

is_id.description: YouTube Video ID to stream or download information.

cgeo.description: Country code in ISO 3166 format of the end user. Defaults to None.
